## ScriptHost.init() method

Explicitly initializes the script host.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

You don't need to call this method. The script host is initialized automatically when needed.
